div.div: Note: The page will have to be refreshed to see the effect of changing these settings

div.class: order-md-2 col-md-4 col-lg-3 offset-md-1 mt-xs-3 mt-sm-4

div.p: The Office of Communications works with media outlets and handles public relations and community relations. The Communications team also designs, edits and produces all district publications. We welcome feedback and comments: enews@ccisd.us

The Office of Communications also includes the liaison for The Corpus Christi Education Foundation, a local nonprofit that serves and supports Corpus Christi ISD. For more information about the foundation, please visit their website www.ccef-ccisd.org.
